        public void setLanguage(java.lang.String language)

        Parameters:
        language - the language charset (two-letter ISO 639-1 identifier)

      • getContentType

        public java.lang.String getContentType()
        Gets the MIME type of the content, for example, "text/plain, text/html". The tags are stripped from HTML content before it is analyzed. Other MIME types are processed as is.
        Returns:
        the contentType

      • setContentType

        public void setContentType(java.lang.String contentType)
        Sets the MIME type of the content, for example, "text/plain, text/html". The tags are stripped from HTML content before it is analyzed. Other MIME types are processed as is.
        Parameters:
        contentType - the new MIME type of the content

      • getParentId

        public java.lang.String getParentId()
        Gets the unique id of the parent content item. Used to identify hierarchical relationships between posts/replies, messages/replies, etc.
        Returns:
        the parent identifier

      • setParentId

        public void setParentId(java.lang.String parentId)
        Sets the unique id of the parent content item. Used to identify hierarchical relationships between posts/replies, messages/replies, etc.,
        Parameters:
        parentId - the parent identifier

      • setForward

        public void setForward(java.lang.Boolean forward)
        Indicates whether this content item is a forwarded/copied version of another content item.
        Parameters:
        forward - set true if the content is a forwarded/copied version of another content item.

      • setReply

        public void setReply(java.lang.Boolean reply)
        Indicates whether this content item is a reply to another content item.
        Parameters:
        reply - true if is a reply
